chapter.title: Z Shell
chapter.section: installing Z shell $ sudo apt-get install zsh

section.title: ~/.zshrc
section.screen:
neo@netkiller:~$ cat .zshrc # Created by newuser for 4.3.9 PROMPT='%n@%M:%~$ '
# enable color support of ls and also add handy aliases if [ -x /usr/bin/dircolors ]; then eval "`dircolors -b`" alias ls='ls --color=auto' alias dir='dir --color=auto' alias vdir='vdir --color=auto'
alias grep='grep --color=auto' alias fgrep='fgrep --color=auto' alias egrep='egrep --color=auto' fi
# some more ls aliases alias ll='ls -l' alias la='ls -A' alias l='ls -CF'
# Home/End/Del key bindkey '\e[1~' beginning-of-line bindkey '\e[4~' end-of-line bindkey "\e[3~" delete-char
